Humidity: 89 %

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with snow beginning this morning then changing to flurries near noon and ending this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Local amount 2 cm except 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
